insert_channel {"id": 1, "user_id": 1, "name": "foobar", "prefix": "+", "bot_name": "hortbot", "active": true}

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :+command add pan FOUND THE (_PARAMETER_CAPS_), HAVE YE?
send hortbot #foobar [HB] Command 'pan' added, restricted to subscribers and above.

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :+command editor pan
send hortbot #foobar [HB] Command 'pan' was last modified by foobar.

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=2;mod=1 :modman!modman@modman.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :+command add pan FOUND THE (_PARAMETER_CAPS_), HAVE YE?
send hortbot #foobar [HB] Command 'pan' updated, restricted to subscribers and above.

handle hortbot @id=__UUID__;room-id=1;user-id=1 :foobar!foobar@foobar.tmi.twitch.tv PRIVMSG #foobar :+command editor pan
send hortbot #foobar [HB] Command 'pan' was last modified by modman.
